sofh.ui.actor.name: Imię postaci:
sofh.ui.actor.reputationrank.1: Ranga 1: Wszyscy w Hogwarcie słyszeli o tym, co zrobiłaś.
sofh.ui.actor.reputationrank.2: Ranga 2: Wszyscy w Hogwarcie rozpoznają Cię i znają Twoje imię.
sofh.ui.actor.reputationrank.3: Ranga 3: Ludzie spoza Hogwartu słyszeli o Tobie.
sofh.ui.actor.reputationrank.5: Ranga 5: Jesteś powszechnie znana w świecie czarodziejów.
sofh.ui.actor.goalgryffindor: Pull off an awesome stunt, save someone, keep being awesome!
sofh.ui.actor.goalhufflepuff: Comfort someone, make a new friend, prove that being good is its own reward!
sofh.ui.actor.goalravenclaw: Invent something new, discover a new place, don't get in trouble!
sofh.ui.actor.goalslytherin: Make a new contact, gain something of worth,increase your reputation!
sofh.ui.xpmasage: Choose one from below. When any player character reaches all five advancements, a school year ends, and everyone can pick one season advancement.
sofh.ui.xpoptin1: Take a new move from your house
sofh.ui.xpoptin2: Take a new move from your house
sofh.ui.xpoptin3: Take a move from a different house
sofh.ui.xpoptin4: Take a move from a different house
sofh.ui.actor.seventhconditions: You are eliminated from the scene (e.g. you flee, fall unconscious, or freeze helpless, etc.). MC decides when you can come back.
sofh.ui.actor.gryffindorquestion1: Are you acting with bravery or protecting friends?
sofh.ui.actor.hufflepuffquestion1: Have you put in the work?
sofh.ui.actor.hufflepuffquestion2: Are you taking what you believe is the most just and fair course of action?
sofh.ui.actor.slytherinquestion1: Are you working toward a personal goal?
sofh.ui.actor.slytherinquestion2: Have you weighed all potential outcomes and picked the one most beneficial to you?
sofh.ui.actor.ravenclawquestion1: Are you using reason and logic?
sofh.ui.actor.ravenclawquestion2: Are you discovering or creating something new?
sofh.ui.housequestionlabel: At the beginning of any game session, highlight one of the questions below. Whenever a move asks two questions, ask your highlighted house question, too. Add +1 if you answer “yes”:
sofh.ui.relationships.caught_breaking_ru: You got caught breaking the rules with:
sofh.ui.relationships.snuck_into_forest_: They snuck into the Forbidden Forest with you because you convinced them to:
sofh.ui.relationships.score_instructions: You start one relationship with +2, one with -1, and the rest with +1. Range: from -2 to +2.
sofh.ui.relationships.title: Your Relationships
sofh.ui.instructions.fill_in_with_player: Fill in at least two with other player characters:
sofh.ui.instructions.fill_in_with_charac: Fill in all with other characters (PC or NPC):
sofh.ui.actor.gryffindoreq: School robes with a Gryffindor crest, a wand, a bag full of schoolbooks, a quill and a pot of ink, a cauldron, and spare parchment.
sofh.ui.actor.hufflepuffreq: School robes with a Hufflepuff crest, a wand, a bag full of school books, a quill and a pot of ink, a cauldron, and spare parchment
sofh.ui.actor.slytherinreq: School robes with a Slytherin crest, a wand, a bag full of schoolbooks, a quill and a pot of ink, a cauldron, and spare parchment.
sofh.ui.actor.ravenclawreq: School robes with a Ravenclaw crest, a wand, a bag full of schoolbooks, a quill and a pot of ink, a cauldron, and spare parchment.
sofh.ui.actor.hufflepuffpet: A rat, a cat, a toad, or an owl
sofh.ui.actor.hufflepuffsmall_herb_garde: A small herb garden under your bed
sofh.ui.actor.hufflepuffbox_charm: A box charm projecting a beautiful scene around
sofh.ui.actor.hufflepuffmuggle_item: A muggle item that non-muggles find fascinating
sofh.ui.actor.slytherinpet: A rat, a cat, a toad, or an owl
sofh.ui.actor.slytherinsignet_ring: A signet ring from your family
sofh.ui.actor.slytherincharmed_parchment: Charmed parchment that translates any language you can hear
sofh.ui.actor.ravenclawpet: A rat, a cat, a toad, or an owl
sofh.ui.actor.ravenclawmechanical_device: A small mechanical device of your own invention
sofh.ui.actor.ravenclawrecord_player: An old record player with a few albums
sofh.ui.actor.ravenclawmuggle_device: A muggle device you've rigged to work at school
sofh.ui.actor.ravenclawbag_of_notes: A bag stuffed full of notes from your studies
sofh.ui.actor.gryffindorpet: A rat, a cat, a toad, or an owl
sofh.ui.actor.gryffindorsubscription: A Daily Prophet / Witch Weekly subscription
sofh.ui.actor.gryffindorpartial_map: A partial map of Hogwarts and the grounds
sofh.ui.actor.gryffindorquidditch_equipm: A snitch, quaffle, bludger, or beater's bat
sofh.ui.actor.gryffindorbertie_botts_bea: A box of Bertie Bott's Every Flavor Beans
sofh.ui.dialog.eqwarrning: You can only select up to 3 options!

sofh.ui.move.resultBelow7: Result of roll is 6 and below
sofh.move.isRelatedToOtherMoves: Is it related to other moves?
